actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to extend certain authorities of the Secretary of the Interior with respect to water resources research and saline water conversion programs.

summary.text: Amends the Water Resources Research Act of 1964 to authorize the additional appropriation of $10,000,000 for fiscal year 1978 for grants by the Secretary of the Interior for water resources research projects. Amends the Saline Water Conversion Act to extend the appropriation authorization through fiscal year 1978. Authorizes the appropriation of $5,025,000 for fiscal year 1978 to carry out the purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend certain authorities of the Secretary of the Interior with respect to water resources research and saline water conversion programs.
